name: Provisión de Alimentos
description: This goal measures the amount of seafood sustainably harvested in a given region through any means for use primarily in human consumption and thus includes wild-caught commercial fisheries, mariculture, artisanal-scale and recreational fisheries.

name: Pesca
description: This subgoal model aims to assess the amount of wild-caught seafood that can be sustainably harvested, with sustainability defined by multi-species yield, and with penalties assigned for both over- and under-harvesting.

name: Maricultura
description: This subgoal measures the ability to obtain maximal seafood yield from farm-raised facilities without damaging the ocean's ability to continue providing fish for people in the future.

name: Oportunidades de Pesca Artesanal
description: This goal captures the access people have to coastal resources, whether or not they actually take fish or harvest from coastal waters.

name: Productos Naturales
description: This goal model calculates overall status by weighting the status of sustainable harvest of each product by its proportional value relative to other harvested products.

name: Secuestro de Carbono
description: This goal captures the carbon stored in natural coastal ecosystems that absorb and sequester carbon in large amounts.

name: Protección Costera
description: This goal measures the amount of protection certain coastal habitats provide by measuring the current area they cover relative to the area they covered in the recent past.

name: Turismo y Recreación
description: This goal captures the value people have for experiencing and taking pleasure in coastal areas.

name: Economía y Medios de Vida
description: This goal aims to maintain coastal and ocean-dependent livelihoods and productive coastal economies while also maximizing livelihood quality.

name: Medios de Vida
description: This subgoal evaluates the benefits people obtain from the oceans in the form of jobs and wages.

name: Economías
description: This subgoal captures the economic value associated with marine industries.

name: Sentido de Lugar
description: This goal aims to capture the level of protection for aspects of the coastal and marine system that contribute to a person's sense of cultural identity.

name: Especies Icónicas
description: This subgoal captures the species that are important to a region because they are relevant to local cultural identity.

name: Lugares Especiales Perdurables
description: This subgoal captures the conservation status of geographic locations that hold significant aesthetic, spiritual, cultural, recreational, or existence value for people.

name: Aguas Limpias
description: This goal captures the degree to which waters are polluted.

name: Biodiversidad
description: This goal captures the conservation status of marine species.

name: Hábitat
description: This subgoal measures the condition of habitats that are important for supporting a wide array of species diversity.

name: Especies
description: This subgoal aims to estimate how successfully the richness and variety of marine life is being maintained.
